verse: शान्ताकारं भुजगशयनं पद्मनाभं सुरेशम् विश्वाधारं गगनसदृशं मेघवर्णं शुभांगम् लक्ष्मीकान्तं कमलनयनं योगिभिर्ध्यानगम्यम् वन्दे विष्णुं भवभयहरं सर्वलोकैकनाथम् ॥
overall_meaning: I bow to Vishnu, who has a peaceful form, rests on a serpent, has a lotus on his navel, is the lord of the gods, the support of the universe, sky-like in vastness, cloud-colored in complexion, with an auspicious body, the consort of Lakshmi, lotus-eyed, attainable by yogis through meditation, the remover of the fear of worldly existence, and the one lord of all worlds.
